includedAssets.title: Audition
includedAssets.synopsis: Will and Sue join forces when their budgets are cut; Finn and Rachel search for new glee members, but Rachel is threatened when one of them is a little too talented.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Will and Sue join forces when their budgets are cut; Finn and Rachel search for new glee members, but Rachel soon feels threatened.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Will and Sue join forces when their budgets are cut; Finn and Rachel search for new glee members, but Rachel is threatened when one of them is a little too talented.

includedAssets.title: Britney/Brittany
includedAssets.synopsis: A trip to the dentist leads Brittany, Santana, Rachel and Artie to experience Britney Spears-based musical fantasies. With a special appearance from Britney.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A trip to the dentist leads Brittany, Santana, Rachel and Artie to experience Britney Spears-based musical fantasies.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A trip to the dentist leads Brittany, Santana, Rachel and Artie to experience Britney Spears-based musical fantasies. With a special appearance from Britney.

includedAssets.title: Grilled Cheesus
includedAssets.synopsis: The glee club discusses faith and religion, while Kurt is devastated when his father suffers a heart attack.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The glee club discusses faith and religion, while Kurt is devastated when his father suffers a heart attack.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The glee club discusses faith and religion, while Kurt is devastated when his father suffers a heart attack.

includedAssets.title: Duets
includedAssets.synopsis: When Puck is sent to juvie, Sam Evans joins as his replacement, and as the gang pair up to perform duets, Kurt sets his sights on the new arrival.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Puck is sent to juvie, Sam Evans joins as his replacement, and as the gang pair up to perform duets, Kurt sets his sights on the new arrival.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Puck is sent to juvie, Sam Evans joins as his replacement, and as the gang pair up to perform duets, Kurt sets his sights on the new arrival.

includedAssets.title: The Rocky Horror Glee Show
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep5 - The Rocky Horror Glee Show
includedAssets.synopsis: In a bid to win Emma back, Will gets the glee club to stage a production of her new favourite musical - The Rocky Horror Picture Show.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In a bid to win Emma back, Will gets the glee club to stage a production of her new favourite musical - The Rocky Horror Picture Show.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In a bid to win Emma back, Will gets the glee club to stage a production of her new favourite musical - The Rocky Horror Picture Show.

includedAssets.title: Never Been Kissed
includedAssets.synopsis: Blaine, a member of rival show choir The Warblers, helps Kurt stand up to Karofsky's bullying. Coach Beiste is upset to learn she's the butt of a team joke.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Blaine, a member of rival choir The Warblers, helps Kurt stand up to Karofsky's bullying. Beiste is upset to learn she's the butt of a team joke.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Blaine, a member of rival show choir The Warblers, helps Kurt stand up to Karofsky's bullying. Coach Beiste is upset to learn she's the butt of a team joke.

includedAssets.title: The Substitute
includedAssets.synopsis: Will and Principal Figgins fall ill, leaving Sue to rule over the school and peppy substitute teacher Holly Holliday (Gwyneth Paltrow) to take over glee club.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Will and Principal Figgins fall ill, leaving Sue to rule over the school and substitute teacher Holly Holliday (Gwyneth Paltrow) to take over glee.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Will and Principal Figgins fall ill, leaving Sue to rule over the school and peppy substitute teacher Holly Holliday (Gwyneth Paltrow) to take over glee club.

includedAssets.title: Furt
includedAssets.synopsis: As Carole and Burt get married, Sue plans her wedding... to herself. Kurt reaches breaking point with Karofsky's bullying and asks to transfer to Dalton Academy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Carole and Burt get married, Sue plans her wedding... to herself. Kurt reaches breaking point with Karofsky's bullying and asks to move schools.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Carole and Burt get married, Sue plans her wedding... to herself. Kurt reaches breaking point with Karofsky's bullying and asks to transfer to Dalton Academy.

includedAssets.title: Special Eduction
includedAssets.synopsis: In a state of disarray, the New Directions compete in Sectionals. Tunes include: Valerie, Dog Days Are Over and (I've Had) The Time of My Life.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In a state of disarray, the New Directions compete in Sectionals. Tunes include: Valerie, Dog Days Are Over and (I've Had) The Time of My Life.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In a state of disarray, the New Directions compete in Sectionals. Tunes include: Valerie, Dog Days Are Over and (I've Had) The Time of My Life.

includedAssets.title: A Very Glee Christmas
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep10 - A Very Glee Christmas
includedAssets.synopsis: While Sue rigs the staff Secret Santa, the kids try to keep Brittany's faith in St Nick alive - until she asks him to make Artie walk again.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Sue rigs the staff Secret Santa, the kids try to keep Brittany's faith in St Nick alive - until she asks him to make Artie walk again.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Sue rigs the staff Secret Santa, the kids try to keep Brittany's faith in St Nick alive - until she asks him to make Artie walk again.

includedAssets.title: The Sue Sylvester Shuffle
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep11 - The Sue Sylvester Shuffle
includedAssets.synopsis: McKinley's championship football game arrives, and it's not just the players who need to perform, with the glee club signed up for the half-time show.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: McKinley's championship football game arrives, and it's not just the players who need to perform, with the glee club signed up for the half-time show.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: McKinley's championship football game arrives, and it's not just the players who need to perform, with the glee club signed up for the half-time show.

includedAssets.title: Silly Love Songs
includedAssets.synopsis: The gang perform romantic odes in aid of Valentine's Day, Finn has an ulterior motive for setting up a fundraising kissing booth and Puck falls for Lauren.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The gang perform romantic odes in aid of Valentine's Day, while Finn has an ulterior motive for setting up a fundraising kissing booth.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The gang perform romantic odes in aid of Valentine's Day, Finn has an ulterior motive for setting up a fundraising kissing booth and Puck falls for Lauren.

includedAssets.title: Comeback
includedAssets.synopsis: Rachel enlists Brittany to help raise her social standing, Sam forms a Justin Bieber tribute band and Sue's manipulative ways continue.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rachel enlists Brittany to help raise her social standing, Sam forms a Justin Bieber tribute band and Sue's manipulative ways continue.

includedAssets.title: Blame It On The Alcohol
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep14 - Blame It On The Alcohol
includedAssets.synopsis: Booze takes its toll on everyone as Will leaves an embarrassing voicemail, Blaine enjoys an unlikely kiss and the club put on a disastrous show.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Booze takes its toll on everyone as Will leaves an embarrassing voicemail, Blaine enjoys an unlikely kiss and the club put on a disastrous show.

includedAssets.title: Sexy
includedAssets.synopsis: Substitute teacher Holly Holliday joins forces with Will to teach the kids about sex, while Emma and Karl visit Holly for some relationship counselling.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Substitute teacher Holly Holliday joins forces with Will to teach the kids about sex, while Emma and Karl visit her for some relationship counselling.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Substitute teacher Holly Holliday joins forces with Will to teach the kids about sex, while Emma and Karl visit Holly for some relationship counselling.

includedAssets.title: Original Song
includedAssets.synopsis: New Directions face another disaster at Regionals and have to come up with an original song, while Kurt and Blaine admit their feelings for each other.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: New Directions face another disaster at Regionals and have to come up with an original song, while Kurt and Blaine admit their feelings.

includedAssets.title: A Night Of Neglact
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep17 - A Night Of Neglact
includedAssets.synopsis: The glee club performs songs by neglected artists in order to raise money for the Academic Decathlon team.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The glee club performs songs by neglected artists in order to raise money for the Academic Decathlon team.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The glee club performs songs by neglected artists in order to raise money for the Academic Decathlon team.

includedAssets.title: Born This Way
includedAssets.synopsis: Rachel considers getting a nose job. Meanwhile, Lauren runs against Quinn for prom queen and digs up some dirt on her in the process.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rachel considers getting a nose job. Meanwhile, Lauren runs against Quinn for prom queen and digs up some dirt on her in the process.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rachel considers getting a nose job. Meanwhile, Lauren runs against Quinn for prom queen and digs up some dirt on her in the process.

includedAssets.title: Rumours
includedAssets.synopsis: In a Fleetwood Mac-dedicated episode, Sue stirs up trouble by planting gossip in the school paper, while Brittany and Artie's relationship hits the rocks.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In a Fleetwood Mac-dedicated episode, Sue stirs up trouble by planting gossip in the school paper, while Brittany and Artie's relationship flounders.

includedAssets.title: Prom Queen
includedAssets.synopsis: It's prom night and the New Directions are set to take the stage. Plus, the race for prom queen hots up, but who will actually take the crown?

includedAssets.title: Funeral
includedAssets.synopsis: When Sue suffers a sad loss, the glee club pull together to help her through it. Plus, Will recruits Jesse to help the gang gear up for Nationals.

includedAssets.title: New York
includedAssets.synopsis: In the season two finale, the kids head to the Big Apple for Nationals. Meanwhile, Will tries to hide his plans to take a role on Broadway.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The New Directions continue their quest to win the national show choir championships in season two of the musical comedy drama, which features tributes to The Rocky Horror Show and Fleetwood Mac.

includedIn.title: Glee
includedIn.synopsis: The William McKinley High School glee club, New Directions, attempt to compete on the highly competitive show choir circuit, while dealing with social issues and learning to work as a team.
